channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The State of America's Wallet
item.description: How the cards, cash, debts and assets that we carry stack up.

item.title: Pope Francis delivers medical supplies in visit to remote jungle town
Are You Ready to Bet on U.S. Elections? A Judge's Ruling Opens the Door
item.description: Prediction-market startup Kalshi prevails in its bid to list political contracts, beating the CFTC.

item.title: China says "dissatisfied" with new Dutch export controls on ASML chipmaking tools
Stock Funds Up 14.2% for Year After Snapback August
item.description: The market pulled out a win for the month despite a rough patch. Also: A flashback to the 10th anniversary of the blockbuster Alibaba IPO.

item.title: Tennis-Sabalenka survives Pegula storm to win U.S. Open women's title
Jobs Slowdown Frustrates Investors Who Wanted Certainty on the Fed
item.description: Revisions and other distortions mean monetary policy outlook remains hazier than Wall Street would have liked.

item.title: Musk denies report his xAI in talks over Tesla revenue
The King of Risky Hometown Bonds Is Back
item.description: Former Nuveen executive John Miller begins a second act at First Eagle.

item.title: Venezuela opposition candidate Gonzalez leaves for Spain as diplomatic tensions rise
